contents.text: Welcome to MissionU in San Francisco, where we equip you with the skills and experience needed to launch a successful career.
For admissions and enrollment information, press 1.
For questions about tuition and financing, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our financial aid advisor.

navigationGoals: Review available financial aid and tuition payment plans.
I need to understand my tuition costs and financing options, including how my GI Bill applies.
I need a breakdown of the tuition cost structure and financing options, including interest rates, repayment schedules, and ROI projections.
I need help understanding tuition payment options and financial aid.
I want to discuss tuition payment options and available financial aid.

contents.text: For application status and deadlines, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our admissions team.

navigationGoals: Check my application status and upcoming deadlines.
I want to check the status of my application and confirm the deadlines I need to meet.
I want to verify my application status and confirm upcoming deadlines, including any missing documentation requirements.
I want to check on my application status and upcoming deadlines.
I’d like to check my application status and confirm the upcoming deadlines.

contents.text: For curriculum details and career support services, press 2.
For an overview of our one-year curriculum, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our program specialists.

navigationGoals: Get a concise overview of the one-year curriculum.
I’d like an overview of the one-year curriculum and how it supports career transition for veterans.
I'm looking for the detailed syllabus outline, course modules, credit allocation, and competency assessments for your one-year curriculum.
Could someone explain the one-year curriculum details to me?
I’m seeking an outline of the one-year curriculum structure and core modules.

contents.text: For information on employer partnerships and job placement, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our career services team.

navigationGoals: Find out employer partnerships and job placement support.
I’m interested in learning about employer partnerships and job placement assistance available to graduates.
I’d like to review your employer partnership network, placement metrics, hiring pipeline integration, and average time-to-hire data.
I’d like information on job placement support and employer partnerships.
I want information on career services, including employer partnerships and job placement support.
